entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
Cloth masks prevent respiratory droplets containing #COVID19 from traveling further through the air.
 
Pennsylvanians are required to wear a mask whenever they leave their homes. #MaskUpPA https://t.co/YNalXubqdi
